nodes.text: The Ulig Abaha Ltd. #2 Warpod, or warpod pinnace, was a starfighter used by the Corporate Sector Authority. They were also used by the Pirates of Iridium before their defeat in 22 BBY.

The 20-meter long Warpod was crewed by a pilot and four gunners who operated the two laser cannon turrets and the bottom-mounted cutting torch. It was capable of going toe-to-toe with older designs from the Galactic Republic, but newer designs like the TIE/LN starfighter or T-65 X-wing starfighter were vastly superior to the #2 Warpod.
Pirates in or around the Corporate Sector sometimes used Warpods. Magg used #2 Warpods against Han Solo over Ammuud.
Pirates & Privateers shows a silhouette of a Warpod which does not resemble the illustration from the Han Solo and the Corporate Sector Sourcebook.
